DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Assess Preventive Effects Cetylpyridinium Chloride Sarcopenia
DOC.detailed_description: 75 people meet inclusion criterion screen test assign one three group randomization . They take medication four week doubleblind . Two study group take cetylpyridinium chloride 1.5mg , 4.5mg daily four week . Control group take placebo period . The main outcome variable measure compare respectively baseline , immediately dose end two week , four week end administration . Finally cetylpyridinium chloride verify whether preventive effect sarcopenia set appropriate dose .
